markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Warpers of Flesh](/Articles.aspx?ID=37)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 64</row>

[Fleshwarps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=47) are creatures born of abominable alchemy and sinister magic. Learn the secrets of those who craft these uncanny aberrations!
name: Warpers of Flesh
